comments.body:
i think we should have these choices in python case perhaps "not_equals" etc....?
that applies to all options.
Actually, since the default is str(None), the Null can be convert as str(None)
why not to add auto_scale_to_doct in this method. caller doesn't need to care about refine output and how to map then.
so this parameter was in totally wrong place right?
